programme.title: Weird Food Diaries - EP 2
programme.desc: In "Weird Food Diaries", avid foodie Rosalyn Lee (also known as Rozz) goes in search of Asia's most bizarre eats. From slimy swamp worms to live delicacies, Rozz eats away across Japan, Vietnam, Cambodia, Taiwan, Thailand, Korea, Indonesia and the Philippines. Whether it's exotic street food or haute cuisine, Rozz is hungry to try it all! In this episode, there's never a dull moment in her weird food quest in the South Korea.

programme.title: The Dr Oz Show 10 - EP 156
programme.desc: (Encore) Women say angels appeared to them, when they had near-death experiences; a surprise for actress Jennifer Garner;.

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags 18 - EP 15
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: The Flash S4 - EP 19
programme.desc: While Harry discovers the results of the Thinking Cap overload on his mind, the rest of the team call on a former ally to help them transport Fallout away from Thinker.

programme.title: Blindspot 2 - EP 11
programme.desc: The team work with the CIA to stop a wanted terrorist who mysteriously surfaced in New York City.

programme.title: The Ellen DeGeneres Show 16 - EP 26
programme.desc: (Encore) Ellen welcomes Melissa McCARTHY ("Can You Ever Forgive Me?"). Rising star Billie Eilish performs her hit "You Should See Me In A Crown".

programme.title: Tropical Gourmet With Justine Scofield - New Caledonia - EP 5
programme.desc: Star of Australia's most watched cooking series everyday gourmet, Justine Schofield heads to the magical island of new Caledonia to explore its gastronomic wonders, tropical beaches and breathtaking natural beauty. Along the way she will also take time out to cook up a delicious variety of dishes inspired by the local, tropical and French influences that make New Caledonia such a special place.

programme.title: Martha Bakes S5 - EP 6
programme.desc: Martha shares her best tips and techniques with viewers, giving them the confidence to create the finest desserts and delectable baked goods in their own kitchens. From Martha's favourite breakfast recipes to puddings and cookies, Martha's updated versions of the classics will set the standard.

programme.title: The Dr Oz Show 9 - EP 96
programme.desc: (Encore) Decoding which canned tuna to buy for both health and flavor; a scientist claims eating more salt could save one's life.

programme.title: All Over The Workplace 2 - EP 1
programme.desc: All Over The Workplace offers children a unique opportunity to explore what it is really like to do the jobs they dream about when they get older. In each episode, two children get to do just that, meeting various celebrities and well-known role models along the way. They even manage to try doing the job for real, often with funny and mind-boggling outcomes!

programme.title: Trulli Tales - EP 0049 & 0050
programme.desc: Before they can become great Wizard Chefs in Trulliland, Ring, Zip, Stella and Sun must first learn to use their cookery skills as well as their magic powers! The magic recipes can be found in a very special book - Trulli Grandma's magic cookbook - which is in danger of disappearing forever, along with its powerful recipes, thanks to the scheming Copperpot.

programme.title: Chirp - EP 0029 & 0030

programme.title: Ready Jet Go! - EP 0041 & 0042
programme.desc: Ready Jet Go! follows two neighborhood kids: Sean, who has an all-consuming drive for science facts, and Sydney, who has a passion for science fiction and imagination. They both befriend the new kid on their street, Jet Propulsion, whose family members happen to be aliens! Together, they embark on great adventures, exploring the solar system, learning about space and science, but always back just in time for dinner!

programme.title: Super4orce - EP 4
programme.desc: Whose afraid of the dark? Not Super4orce. The team tries to solve the mystery of the blackouts plaguing Garden City. They try to track the lead suspect Vaughn who seems to have electrical malfunctions following him all day. But Jake not being able to control his powers could put the team in great danger as they try to find the villain who is absorbing all the electricity. And when Jake gets into a electrical battle with the villain, things get out of hand.

programme.desc: Did you know that according to the World Obesity Federation, by the year 2025, 36.5 per cent of men and 21.7 per cent of women here in Singapore are estimated to be obese? What are the steps we can take to avoid this? How can we prevent obesity from rising in Singapore? Join our special celebrity guests Dr. Oz and Chef Bob, as they explore Singaporeans' eating habits existing from school kids to adulthood. Our specialist in studio will also help us kick-start the road to a healthy lifestyle.

programme.title: 超人哪里找 Oh My Heroes! - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) In a twist of fate, Kenneth & Eugene Tan, 2 brothers who were former officers from the forces and fitness enthusiasts, were diagnosed with Hereditary Spastic Paraplegia, a rare neurological condition that affects their mobility. But they struggled and managed to stay tough despite all odds. They document their training progress, as well as to spread awareness of living with mobility impairment and helping others in the same situation. (重)外向而好动的陈氏兄弟一直以来都是体格健壮的运动员。国民服役时期一个隶属突击队，一个是海军蛙人部队。然而哥哥渐渐觉得不妥，体力不济，检查之后赫然发现是遗传痉挛性下身截瘫（HSP），影响下半身的行动能力而最终可能会坐轮椅。弟弟后来也被诊断有同样的问题。正当人生、事业正在起步的两兄弟，如同被判刑，一度很沮丧、自闭。经过家人和朋友的鼓励，他们调适心态，勇敢的面对此生最大的挑战。他们通过社交媒体来记录复健的心路历程，让更多人了解这罕见的病症，也希望可以启发到其他身处逆境的人。.

programme.desc: (R) Mingxi is heartbroken to see Zhi-an working at a fried chicken restaurant. She pays off the boss of the restaurant and orders him to sack Zhi-an on purpose. Daojing engages Zhi-an to work part-time at Yangpyeong. Daojing hurries off mid-way, leaving Zhi-an to wait for him in the rain. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)明熙看到知安在炸鸡店工作，很不舍，于是给了炸鸡店老板一笔钱，要他故意开除知安。道京要知秀到杨平为一个活动当翻译员抵债。道京突然离开会场，不知情的知秀傻傻地在杨平等道京，结果受困大雨中。.

programme.title: Fresh!新登场 – 霸占爱情 Fresh Takes - Chope Love
programme.desc: (R) "Fresh Takes" is a series of 10 local short films directed and produced by Mediacorp artistes Bryan Wong, Romeo Tan, Shane Pow, Priscelia Chan, Joanne Peh and Ian Fang, as well as production teams from Mediacorp Chinese Drama, Studiomonki, Wawa Pictures and August Pictures. (PG)(重)刚从美国来新加坡工作的Leo，不熟悉本地文化，在商业区的小贩中心里，坐了上班族Aries用纸巾霸占的座位。两人为此起冲突。Leo对Aries的无理取闹感到不满，于是凭着超强的观察力，推测Aries正处于事业最失败阶段，并当众嘲讽了Aries，令她暴跳如雷。两人为此闹得不欢而散。第二天，两人霸位之战随即开始。这回，Leo直接用雨伞霸占了桌子。Aries也不甘示弱，用纸巾霸占了椅子。结果，Aries虽坐在椅子上用餐，却得捧着碗筷，不能占用Leo霸住的桌子。而没椅子坐的Leo也只能站着吃东西。两人就这样瞪着对方进食。第三天，一名女流氓乘Leo去买食物时，抢了他霸好的位子。Aries看不过去，上前质问女流氓，结果被对方欺负。Leo挺身而出维护Aries，凭犀利的言语激怒了女流氓。女流氓恼羞成怒，一拳打破Leo的鼻子，跟着愤然离去。Leo英勇的举动让Aries对他印象改观。.

programme.title: 百味人生 Food Of Life - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) All farmers hope for good crop harvest and fishermen hope for good harvest at sea. Every harvest season is the best time to enjoy good food. People celebrate with gourmet cuisine to express and share their joy. People are grateful to the gifts from nature and hope for another full harvest next year. (重)农民耕种渴望庄稼丰收。渔民出海渴望鱼虾丰收。每年一到丰收的季节，也是享用美食的最佳时期。在丰收的季节里，人们相聚庆贺，共享美食佳肴，抒发与分享喜悦之情。人们感谢大自然的馈赠，期望来年也能收获满满。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 24
programme.desc: (R) Xiuqing finds out that Xiantai has been sabotaged by Zaiyong. Zaiyong defends himself by saying that he made a wrong decision because he wants to keep Xiuqing by his side. Zaiyong also spins a fake story about his background in an attempt to gain Xiuqing's sympathy. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)秀卿发现是载永陷害贤泰的。贤泰承认泄露假情报，但为了要博取秀卿的同情，竟编故事说自己从小被父亲抛弃，一路走来非常辛苦。秀卿果真同情载永，没有公开载永的行为。.

programme.title: 医疗船 Hospital Ship - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Enzai stresses that Guo Xian has no rights to determine Teacher Xue's operation. Teacher Xue consoles Guo Xian and Enzai and volunteers to donate his organ upon his death. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)恩在认为郭贤没有权力决定手术，只有薛季灿才可。于是恩在出面说服，但薛季灿心意已决。没有答应动手术的薛季灿打算捐献遗体，为恩在的研究出份力。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 5
programme.desc: Meijing cannot bear to see Zhi-an slog for the rest of her life. She brings Zhi-an to meet Zaicheng and Mingxi and tells Zhi-an that they are her real parents. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)美静不忍心看着知安被生活压得喘不过气，于是带她去与载成和明熙见面，并告诉知安，他们才是她的亲生父母。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 6
programme.desc: Daojing goes to apologise to Zhi-an, but Zhi-an does not appear appreciative. The provoked Daojing hence insists that Zhi-an pays the car repair fees in full and also calls her a beggar. Zhi-an decides to acknowledge the Cuis as her parents to escape poverty. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)道京为了之前把知安留在杨平的事特地到知安的家附近等她，想向她道歉，但知安因为道京间接害她又失去工作而对道京不耐烦，令道京很反感，不但要知恩还他修车费的总数，还指她是乞丐。知安因此觉得很委屈，决定认崔氏夫妇为父母，摆脱贫困的生活。.

programme.title: 谁来晚餐2019 Guess Who 2019 - EP 13
programme.desc: Celebrities will be invited to visit a family and join them for dinner. The family will have no idea who the celebrity will be beforehand. The invited celebrity will share his or her experience with the family through conversation during a meal. (最后一集)“谁来晚餐" 是个时下颇为流行的实况电视节目. 每集节目都拜访一个家庭,并邀请他们的梦幻嘉宾上门共进晚餐.内容没有太多刻意的安排, 也许是小小梦想的完成, 也可能会看到名人卸下包装与身段之后的真情流露.

programme.title: 同盟 The Unholy Alliance - EP 25
programme.desc: Wei Lei sacrifices his life in an attempt to expose "Rainman". But before he dies, he manages to leave a valuable clue that enables Ling Xiong to trace it to Jin Tian, the former Deputy Director of the Police Department. (PG13-暴力镜头)为了揭露"Rainman"的身份，韦磊牺牲了自己的生命。但他在临死前，却留下了宝贵的线索，致使令熊能够凭借它，查出那神秘人"Rainman", 即是前副警察处长金天。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 谁来晚餐2019 Guess Who 2019 - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) Celebrities will be invited to visit a family and join them for dinner. The family will have no idea who the celebrity will be beforehand. The invited celebrity will share his or her experience with the family through conversation during a meal. programme.title: 创! (PG) Start Up! - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) A mysterious person walked into Xuan's room and take away the wooden box which used to contain the thumbdrive. Sun Shao found out that Doobie was a victim in the accident that happened 12 years ago. (PG)(重)殷萱和Jessie在庭前会议见面，Enzo以在早一天申请科技版权的理由，证明Graffiti是抄袭Hands！的。殷萱不放弃，决定一定要打官司。 神秘人走进入殷萱的房间，把盒子给拿走。 孙少在Doobie的房间，发现殷萱的盒子，发现Doobie也是车祸的受害者。.

programme.title: 一人行。暖人心 Going Miles, Spreading Smiles - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) After going through the grind and gruel for the last 20 years, the sister and brother duo K-Lin & K-Jin, made a big and bold decision to leave everything behind in Singapore and start a new life in Chiang Mai - with a mission to give back to society. (重)怀着一颗回报社会的心，这对姐弟组合K-Lin林嘉宁和K-Jin林嘉仁做了一个重要而大胆的决定：放弃新加坡的一切，净身来到清迈展开全新的生活。他们在清迈顶下了一间餐厅，餐厅外观看似平凡，但背后蕴藏着一段不平凡的动人故事。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 25
programme.desc: (R) Xianying sees Xiuqing and Xiantai kiss. She goes to the venue where Zhenshu is giving a talk and accuses Zhenshu's son-in-law for going in-between a couple's relationship. Zhenshu advises Xiantai to back out of the love triangle. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)仙英目睹秀卿亲吻贤泰，于是气冲冲地到真淑演讲的地点，在众目睽睽之下指真淑的女婿抢走别人的女人。真淑向贤泰直言希望他退出与载永和秀卿的三角恋，不要卷入别人的纠纷中。.

programme.title: 医疗船 Hospital Ship - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) In a bus accident, Guo Xian found the schoolboy, Xiao San trapped in the bus. He needs to insert a tube into the boy but he has a phobia of doing it. With Enzai's encouragement, Guo Xian overcomes the fear and saved the boy. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)郭贤找到了遇难的小善，却因为恐惧而发挥不了医术，恩在前来鼓励他，最后成功救出小善。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 7
programme.desc: Meijing tells Taixiu that she has lied about Zhi-an being Enshi so that Zhi-an can lead a good life with the Cui family. Taixiu is not agreeable with what Meijing has done, but Meijing does not want Zhi-an to suffer anymore and thus does not want to correct the mistake. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)美静向太修坦白她为了让知安过好日子，故意把知安说成是恩石。太修不同意美静撒谎，但美静觉得知秀无论到哪里都会很幸福，但知安待在徐家就一定会不幸，所以决定不纠正错误。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 8
programme.desc: Taixiu wants Zhi-an not to go to the Cuis, but Zhi-an says she does not want to lead a lowly life anymore. Taixiu is unable to retain Zhi-an as he is unable to provide for Zhi-an. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)太修要求知安别到崔家去，但知安说她不想再过卑微的日子，所以想去。太修没有办法让知安过富裕的生活，因此就算万般不愿意，也无法再开口挽留她。.

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 2
programme.desc: Host Greta Georges is in Vietnam on a special delivery mission for World Vision, a humanitarian organization dedicated to tackling the root causes of poverty. She has to buy a young cow, bring it for vaccination and insemination and then deliver the precious bovine. Waiting for Greta in Hung Yen province is a young woman who is shouldering the entire burden for her impoverished family comprising an aged father, a disabled husband; two malnourished children. 六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 未来的食物工厂 Savouring the Future - EP 2
programme.desc: In this episode, Bjorn discovers how local food SMEs, Mr Bean and Hara, with the help of food labs, turn soy pulp - previously discarded - into innovative food products. 在《未来的食物工厂》，餐馆老板兼厨师沈观远将探讨新加坡中小型饮食企业运作和创新手法。 为了应对本地市场带来的挑战，中小型企业所采取的策略已超越自动化和研发新产品，迈向国际化的目标发展。.

programme.title: 同盟 The Unholy Alliance - EP 26
programme.desc: As a result of repeated instigations by "Rainman", Ling Xi and Anthony jointly devise a plot to kill Ling Xiong in the hope of saving themselves. Though this attempt on her life is averted, Ling Xiong decides to launch an offensive against "Rainman" to stem out the threat. (PG13-暴力镜头)经不住"Rainman"的一再挑唆，令熹和令家和合谋杀害令熊，以求自保。虽然他们的阴谋没有得逞，令熊决定对"Rainman"进行反击，以免再生事端。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 买卖 Business As Usual - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) In an environment without resources, slum residents come up with unimaginable businesses to survive. From leftover meat (Pagpag), slum tours, recycled garbage to street performances, this episode shows you extreme poverty and how it creates different kinds of commodities in the slums of Manila. (重)贫民窟向来是资源缺乏的地方，在这样的困难环境底下，为了生存而衍生了各式各样意想不到的买卖。从回收肉pagpag, 贫民窟观光，垃圾回收，以及训练小狗街头卖艺，看看极度的贫穷，如何催生出马尼拉贫民窟的各种另类买卖。.

programme.title: 探索食材 The Food Detectives 3 - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) The new season of "The Food Detectives" continues the culinary exploration of the foods we eat and more. Host Nikki Muller, will debunk the myths, delve into the unknowns and provide useful information to help us make informed choices for the meals we enjoy and how they fit into our lifestyles. (重)(双声道-中/英).

programme.title: 传说中的料理 II Legendary Cuisines 2 - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Do you know that Genghis Khan must have grilled skewered mutton before he leaves for the battlefield? Or how is the Dowager Chrysanthemum Hot Pot related to Empress Cixi? The new season of Legendary Cuisines has the answers. (重).

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 26
programme.desc: (R) Zaiyong plays the audio recording he made with the mother of the eye witness to Xiantai. Zaiyong says he can help Xiantai contact the eye witness on the condition that Zaiyong does not see Xiuqing anymore. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)载永拿出当年目击车祸的学生的母亲的录音给贤泰听。载永说可以帮贤泰联络到目击者，但条件是要贤泰永远消失在秀卿眼前。.

programme.title: 医疗船 Hospital Ship - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Guo Xian and Enzai's relationship progresses. Cui Yingen comes on board the hospital ship and addresses herself as Guo Xian's fiance, and insists on sharing a room with Guo Xian; Enzai feels upset about this. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)郭贤与恩在关系变得亲密，崔英恩来到医疗船，四处向人公布郭贤是自己的未婚夫。还要求搬到郭贤宿舍同住，令恩在不愉。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 9
programme.desc: Daojing sees Zhi-an at home and assumes that she has gone to his house to threaten and blackmail him. He gives her a scolding and is extremely embarrassed when he hears later that Zhi-an is Enshi. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)道京在家里看到知安，以为知安故意找上门威胁及敲诈他，于是不分青红皂白地把她大骂一顿。道京知道知安就是恩石后觉得尴尬不已。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 10
programme.desc: Mingxi wants Zhi-an to spend a big sum of money in one day. Zhi-an buys gifts for the Xu family happily. However, Zhi-xiu is unappreciative and wants Zhi-an not to treat them like beggars. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)明熙要知安在一天内花完三千万韩元。知安开心地买礼物给徐家的家人们，知秀却不领情，不但不接受，还要知安别把他们当成乞丐。.

programme.title: 线人 3 Fixer 3 - EP 2
programme.desc: Fixer is a group of righteous people who helps to uphold social justice, exposing the truth of reality and create social awareness. Through their reporting power and intervention, the people and issues involved can get the right attention and assistance. Thus, revealing the truth and hidden stories. 线人，一群维护社会公平正义，揭露事实真相的义士，借助他们采访社会议题的力量，透过他们的介入，引起社会的关注，让事件中的人与事得到重视和关注，进而得到合理解决，让人们了解事件的真相，揭发不为人知的内幕。.

programme.title: 同盟 The Unholy Alliance - EP 27
programme.desc: Zijie and Kent pretend to be engaged in a fight over the Chairmanship of their company. When Zijie "kills" Kent in a fake duel, "Rainman" is convinced of Zijie's trustworthiness and agrees to do business with him. At last, this provides Zijie with an opportunity to spy on "Rainman". programme.title: 寻找原之味 Food Old Days - EP 3

(重)新加坡号称美食天堂，新加坡人最喜爱的休闲活动之一就是全岛搜寻最好吃的熟食档、到全岛各角落品尝本地美食。然而，随着时代进步、空间变迁，许多传统美食因为后继无人而渐渐消失，许多传统做法因为科技而渐渐失传。.

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Host Greta Georges is in Vietnam on a special delivery mission for World Vision, a humanitarian organization dedicated to tackling the root causes of poverty. She has to buy a young cow, bring it for vaccination and insemination and then deliver the precious bovine. Waiting for Greta in Hung Yen province is a young woman who is shouldering the entire burden for her impoverished family comprising an aged father, a disabled husband; two malnourished children. (重)六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 未来的食物工厂 Savouring the Future - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) In this episode, Bjorn discovers how local food SMEs, Mr Bean and Hara, with the help of food labs, turn soy pulp - previously discarded - into innovative food products. (重)在《未来的食物工厂》，餐馆老板兼厨师沈观远将探讨新加坡中小型饮食企业运作和创新手法。 为了应对本地市场带来的挑战，中小型企业所采取的策略已超越自动化和研发新产品，迈向国际化的目标发展。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Yiyuan proposes to supply cooked food to the hospital canteen. Haixiu and her fellow cooks object to the proposal as the move will directly affect their livelihoods. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)艺苑以ONE'S食品代表的身份跟宇真任职的医院接洽，说要为医院提供优质的食物。艺苑参观餐厅，海秀和她的同事们因不了解医院为何有厨师还要接受ONE'S食品的半现成食物，与艺苑起口角。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Wancai is admitted to the neighbourhood hospital when he meets with a traffic accident. It is then that he and Xiuzi discover that Yuzhen is no longer working at the university hospital. Wancai and Xiuzi are devastated as they have pinned all their hopes on Yuzhen. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)万才发生车祸，从而发现宇真已经不在大学医院工作了。万才和秀子把一切希望寄托在宇真身上，发现他在小医院上班，伤心不已。.

programme.title: 危情三日 3 Days - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) The President hopes Taiqing can stay and protect him. However, the death of Fengxiu and loss of faith lead Taiqing to tender his resignation. Kuizhen dismisses the other officers and tries to get the Prime Minister to stand on the same side of the fence. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)总统希望泰庆可以留下来保护自己，但奉秀的死和信念的迷失早已让泰庆失去自信，决定辞去警卫员一职。奎镇开始私下辞退其他官员并拉拢总理。.

programme.title: 危情三日 3 Days - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Taiqing decodes the encrypted document left behind by his father and looks for the witness, Major Li Zhekui. Meanwhile, Daochen tries to stop Li from attending the press conference. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)在宝媛的影响下，泰庆破解了父亲的加密文件，并寻找证人李哲奎少佐。此时道辰极力阻止哲奎出席记者招待会。.

programme.title: 梦想的声音 3 Sound Of My Dream S3 - EP 3
programme.desc: A music variety where a number of talented singers, amateur or otherwise are given the chance to "challenge" a celebrity tutor by singing one of the celebrity's songs. In exchange, the celebrity is assigned one of four randomly selected songs and has three hours to come up with a cover performance of this song. 与上季相同，基本模式为星素挑战，由追梦歌手对导师发起讨教（挑战）。但在第三季开始，选歌模式已经更换为第一季的模式，可是选择权是由参赛者说“开始”的时候，只要喊“停”，那一首歌曲就是讨教老师要唱的歌。和第一季不一样的是，每一首歌都有关键词。如果进行第二轮讨教，是没有任何的关键词。时间也从之前的6个小时改成3个小时。据华少声称，如果“惊”曲榜里的歌曲原唱者是导师的话，讨教歌手若是选择原唱者导师，将会带来的难度和风险更大，最终导致讨教失败。这一季的歌手包括林俊杰，王嘉尔，胡彦斌，张靓颖，谭维维 等。.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 1
programme.desc: Jingshu asks Shengzhu out and tells her that director Hong, knowing that she will only report for work at the TV station three weeks later, wants her to help produce a two episodes special documentary for the founding of his company. Shengzhu initially wanted to turn down the job and enjoy a long break. However, she accepts the challenge after finding out that she is to film the grandson of the legendary master of gayageum, Wu He. She decides to look for Wu He in the mountains with the address provided by director Hong. (PG)(首播)(双声道-中/韩)景淑约胜珠见面告诉她洪代表知道她3周后才去电视台工作，要找她帮他公司制作2 集创社特辑的传统记录片。胜珠原想推掉放大假，但听是要拍摄传说中远离俗世的伽耶琴名匠的孙子吴赫，便觉得很有挑战性。她决定拿着洪代表给的地址去山里寻找那名匠后人吴赫….

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 2
programme.desc: Shengzhu's brother Shengtai and mother, unbeknownst to Shengzhu, surreptitiously visit the piece of mountain land which Shengzhu's aunt has given to her. They plan to chase the residents of the villagers out from there and start a resort venture. When Zuodou learns about this and finds out that Shengzhu is the landlord, he immediately leaves the mountains and looks for Shengzhu to persuade her to let him continue staying there. Fortuitously, he saves Shengzhu from a masked man trying to kill her. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)胜珠的弟弟胜泰与妈妈瞒着胜珠，偷偷跑去看姑姑送给胜珠的山地。他们打算赶走住在山里的村民，以做度假村的投资。当作斗知道这个消息和得知地主是胜珠后，立刻下山去找胜珠商量让他继续居住的事，却凑巧救了差点遭蒙面男人杀害的胜珠。.

programme.title: 小当家 Little Maestros - EP 9
programme.desc: Abandoned at birth, Ding Yan was adopted 12 years ago. Her foster father found work in another town, leaving her as a stay-at-home child to shoulder the task to care for her ill grandparents. Why is she willing to take up such chores and farm work, giving her all for a family without blood relation? 丁燕是一名弃婴，12年前，她被人收养。但养父在她很小的时候就外出打工，她成了留守儿童，在家中负起照顾生病的爷爷和奶奶的责任。是什么令她愿意承担起所有的家务和农活，撑起一个毫无血缘关系的家呢？.

Let's find out! 久违了的美丽人妻徐秀盈首次上节目！身为新加坡女人，她是否认为新加坡女人嫁不出全都是受新加坡男人牵连？郑斌辉和苏梽诚要如何反驳和争辩，为新加坡男人保住立场！看了这集，你会对新加坡女人和男人有不同的看法！.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 28
programme.desc: Ep 28: Yuzhi introduces Xiantai to a Mr Huang who orders 3000 jackets from Xiantai. Unexpectedly, Mr Huang disappears without making payment after receiving the goods. Xiantai is suspected of receiving bribes from Mr Huang. Yinghao wants Xiantai to resign and take responsibility of the losses suffered by the company. Ep 28: 宇植在载永的指使下安排一位假社长向贤泰订购三千套团体服。该社长在收货后失联，令KP集团收不到付款，贤泰还被闭路电视拍到疑似收取贿赂的画面。英鎬要贤泰辞职，为公司蒙受的损失负责。.

programme.title: 医疗船 Hospital Ship - EP 12
programme.desc: Cui Yingen confides to Guo Xian that she has been diagnosed with acute leukemia and left with two years life. She hopes Guo Xian can take care of her.Enzai gets anxious learning that her brother, Yuzai , has been injured in a site accident. 崔英恩告诉郭贤她患了急性骨髓性白血病，可能只有两年的命，希望郭贤这段时间能照顾她。恩在得知弟弟宇在在地盘现场受了伤，大感焦急。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 13
programme.desc: Ep 13: Zhi-an skips a lesson to rush to Zhixiu's side when she finds out that Zhixiu is drunk. Mingxi is displeased with Zhi-an's behavior and orders for everything that can remind Zhi-an of the Xus to be thrown away. 知安拨电给知秀时发现知秀喝醉了，于是立刻翘课赶到知秀的身边。明熙大为不悦，要闵部长把能够勾起知安对徐家的眷恋的物品一律丢掉，令知安难过不已。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 14
programme.desc: Ep 14: Zhi-an attempts to climb over the wall to retrieve her belongings that have been thrown away by Mingxi. Daojing stops her. He returns Zhi-an's prized wood figurines to her and also brings her out for a drink. Daojing's thoughtfulness enables Zhi-an to change her impression of him. 知安尝试爬墙到屋外出去找被明熙丢掉的东西，却被道京逮个正着。道京把知安的木雕还给她，还带知安去喝啤酒。两人的关系因此改善。.

programme.title: 北京到莫斯科 Beijing To Moscow - EP 10
programme.desc: After finding Mei Ling, she reveals that she met Kloudiia in church. Kloudiia had turned to the church to help cope with her grief of losing An Ran and the reason for Kloudiia's suicide attempt triggered Kai Xiang's memories to flood back in. While Kai Xiang was preparing for his wedding, An Ran had a terrible accident that left him fighting for his life. At a loss of what to do, Kloudiia begged Kai Xiang to return to Moscow to see his son. 美玲是Kloudiia在教会认识的好友，在她初遇Kloudiia时，Kloudiia正处于崩溃的边缘。是她一直陪伴Kloudiia，帮她走出人生低谷。原来Kloudiia还活着，不过孩子已经不在了！当时Kloudiia是因为突如其来的丧子之痛才崩溃选择自杀。Kloudiia自杀丧子的真相，刺激了凯翔，也揭开了他逃婚的谜底。原来凯翔和筱琦筹备婚礼时，安然却遇上严重意外，危在旦夕。慌张失措的Kloudiia 恳求凯翔到莫斯科一趟，见他们的孩子安然最后一面。.
